channel.title: NMS:INTC on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:INTC on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Stocks Retreat From Records as Profits Disappoint: Markets Wrap
item.description: Stocks posted small moves at the end of a record-setting week after lackluster results from Intel Corp. and Puma SE. The dollar advanced.

item.title: Stocks Retreat From Records as Profits Disappoint: Markets Wrap
item.description: Stocks posted small moves at the end of a record-setting week after lackluster results from Intel Corp. and Puma SE. The dollar advanced.

item.title: Intel Gives Upbeat Sales Forecast After PC Demand Picks Up
item.description: Intel Corp. gave a stronger-than-anticipated revenue forecast for the current period, offering investors a glimmer of hope as they wait for a turnaround under new Chief Executive Officer Lip-Bu Tan. T
